snippet: Gov. Rick Scott will not seek United States Supreme Court review of a law that would have required applicants for welfare benefits to submit to drug testing.
abstract: Florida Gov Rick Scott will not seek United States Supreme Court review of a law that would have forced applicants for welfare benefits to submit to drug testing.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Scott will not seek United States Supreme Court review of a law that would have required applicants for welfare benefits to submit to drug testing.

headline.main: Florida: Drug Testing Law Is Dropped
headline.print_headline: Florida: Drug Testing Law Is Dropped
